contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Union |name= V.S.E.C. |country= [[India]] |affiliation= [[Indian National Trade Union Congress]] |members= |full_name= Visakha Steel Employees' Congress |native_name= |image= |founded= |current= |head= |dissolved_date= |dissolved_state= |merged_into= |office= |people= [[M. Rajashekar]] (General Secretary), [[Gandham Venkata Rao]] (President) |website= |footnotes= }} '''Visakha Steel Employees' Congress''', the recognized [[trade union]] at the [[Visakhapatnam Steel Plant]], in [[Visakhapatnam]], [[India]]. VSEC is affiliated to the [[Indian National Trade Union Congress]]. The general secretary of VSEC is M. Rajashekar and the President is Gandham Venkata Rao. {{Portal|Organized labour}} [[Category:Trade unions of the Visakhapatnam Steel Plant]] [[Category:Indian National Trade Union Congress]] [[Category:Metal trade unions]] {{India-trade-union-stub}}
